item.title: Origins and Manufacture of Addictive Drugs
item.description: Drug Classifications By their legality Licit Drugs (Legal) Illicit Drugs (Illegal) By their effect on the central nervous system Depressants - Slow down activity Stimulants - Speed up activity Hallucinogen - Alter sensory perception (psychotogenic) - interfere with CNS signalling Other - Multiple effects Depressants Stimulants
